Entity.Description: This table stores Standard Allowable Minutes for different Productivity Types.
Entity.Name: Productivity_Type

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute.
Attribute.Name: Productivity_Type_Key

Attribute.Description: Owner organization of the node for which this productivity type is defined.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The productivity type defined for this SAM.
Attribute.Name: Productivity_Type

Attribute.Description: Description of productivity type.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the productivity metrics should be captured by trip level.
Attribute.Name: Capture_Trip_Level_Metrics

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the time credit for users per source location visited.
Attribute.Name: Allowed_Mins_Per_Source_Locn

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the time credit for users per unit weight of item moved.
Attribute.Name: Allowed_Mins_Per_Unit_Weight

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the time credit for users per unit horizontal distance covered.
Attribute.Name: Allowed_Mins_Per_Unit_Horizontal_Distance

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the time credit for users per unit vertical distance covered.
Attribute.Name: Allowed_Mins_Per_Unit_Vertical_Distance

Attribute.Description: Equipment type associated with the productivity type.
Attribute.Name: Equipment_Type

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the time credit for users per target location visited.
Attribute.Name: Allowed_Mins_Per_Target_Locn

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the time credit for users per source level visited.
Attribute.Name: Allowed_Mins_Per_Source_Level

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the time credit for users per target level visited.
Attribute.Name: Allowed_Mins_Per_Target_Level

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the time credit for users per task performed.
Attribute.Name: Allowed_Mins_Per_Task

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the time credit for users per case handled.
Attribute.Name: Allowed_Mins_Per_Case

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the time credit for users per pallet handled.
Attribute.Name: Allowed_Mins_Per_Pallet

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the time credit for users per unit handled.
Attribute.Name: Allowed_Mins_Per_Unit

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the time credit for users per source aisle visited.
Attribute.Name: Allowed_Mins_Per_Source_Aisle

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the time credit for users per target aisle visited.
Attribute.Name: Allowed_Mins_Per_Target_Aisle

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the time credit for users per item handled.
Attribute.Name: Allowed_Mins_Per_Item

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the time credit for users per trip.
Attribute.Name: Allowed_Mins_Constant

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: The time stamp of when the standard allowable minutes for the productivity type are last computed using computeSAM api .
Attribute.Name: Computed_Sam_Date

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per source location visited is applicable to this productivity type or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Allowed_Mins_Per_Source_Locn_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per unit weight of item moved is applicable to this productivity type or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Allowed_Mins_Per_Unit_Weight_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per unit horizontal distance covered is applicable to this productivity type or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Allowed_Mins_Per_Unit_Horizontal_Distance_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per unit vertical distance covered is applicable to this productivity type or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Allowed_Mins_Per_Unit_Vertical_Distance_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per target location visited is applicable to this productivity type or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Allowed_Mins_Per_Target_Locn_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per source level visited is applicable to this productivity type or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Allowed_Mins_Per_Source_Level_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per target level visited is applicable to this productivity type or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Allowed_Mins_Per_Target_Level_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per task performed is applicable to this productivity type or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Allowed_Mins_Per_Task_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per case handled is applicable to this productivity type or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Allowed_Mins_Per_Case_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per pallet handled is applicable to this productivity type or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Allowed_Mins_Per_Pallet_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per unit handled is applicable to this productivity type or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Allowed_Mins_Per_Unit_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per source aisle visited is applicable to this productivity type or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Allowed_Mins_Per_Source_Aisle_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per target aisle visited is applicable to this productivity type or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Allowed_Mins_Per_Target_Aisle_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per item handled is applicable to this productivity type or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Allowed_Mins_Per_Item_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per trip is applicable to this productivity type or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Allowed_Mins_Constant_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per task is applicable to this productivity type during planning.
Attribute.Name: Is_Planned_Per_Task_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per batch is applicable to this productivity type during planning.
Attribute.Name: Is_Planned_Per_Batch_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per item is applicable to this productivity type in planning.
Attribute.Name: Is_Planned_Per_Item_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per unit is applicable to this productivity type in planning.
Attribute.Name: Is_Planned_Per_Unit_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per case is applicable to this productivity type in planning.
Attribute.Name: Is_Planned_Per_Case_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per pallet is applicable to this productivity type in planning.
Attribute.Name: Is_Planned_Per_Pallet_Appl

Attribute.Description: This column indicates whether the time credit for users per unit weight is applicable to this productivity type in planning.
Attribute.Name: Is_Planned_Per_Unit_Wt_Appl

Attribute.Description: Estimated time credit in minutes for users per task.
Attribute.Name: Planned_Mins_Per_Task

Attribute.Description: Estimated time credit in minutes for users per batch.
Attribute.Name: Planned_Mins_Per_Batch

Attribute.Description: Estimated time credit in minutes for users per item.
Attribute.Name: Planned_Mins_Per_Item

Attribute.Description: Estimated time credit in minutes for users per unit.
Attribute.Name: Planned_Mins_Per_Unit

Attribute.Description: Estimated time credit in minutes for users per case.
Attribute.Name: Planned_Mins_Per_Case

Attribute.Description: Estimated time credit in minutes for users per pallet.
Attribute.Name: Planned_Mins_Per_Pallet

Attribute.Description: Estimated time credit in minutes for users per unit wt.
Attribute.Name: Planned_Mins_Per_Unit_Wt

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the maximum idle time between tasks.
Attribute.Name: Max_Idle_Time_Between_Tasks

Entity.Description: This table stores productivity reference for different Productivity Types.
Entity.Name: Productivity_Reference

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute.
Attribute.Name: Productivity_Reference_Key

Attribute.Description: Owner organization of the node for which this productivity reference is defined.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The productivity type for which this Productivity reference is defined.
Attribute.Name: Productivity_Type

Attribute.Description: Equipment type associated with the productivity type.
Attribute.Name: Equipment_Type

Attribute.Description: This contains the XMLAttribute name of any String column in the YFS_PRODUCITVITY record.
Attribute.Name: Productivity_Reference

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table gives the productivity metrics for tasks done by users.
Entity.Name: Productivity

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_PRODUCTIVITY table.
Attribute.Name: Productivity_Key

Attribute.Description: The organization of the task.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: Equipment type associated with the productivity type.
Attribute.Name: Equipment_Type

Attribute.Description: The user for whom the productivity is being defined.
Attribute.Name: User_Id

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the team lead id used to an organization's server.
Attribute.Name: Team_Lead_Id

Attribute.Description: The enterprise key that is associated with this productivity.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Key

Attribute.Description: The productivity type for which the metrics has been calculated.
Attribute.Name: Productivity_Type

Attribute.Description: The date on which the tasks were executed.
Attribute.Name: Date_Of_Execution

Attribute.Description: The start time of the earliest task included in this productivity batch.
Attribute.Name: Earliest_Task_Start_Time_Stamp

Attribute.Description: The end time of the latest task included in this productivity batch.
Attribute.Name: Latest_Task_End_Time_Stamp

Attribute.Description: The number of tasks performed by the user.
Attribute.Name: Num_Of_Tasks

Attribute.Description: The number of units handled by the user.
Attribute.Name: Num_Of_Units

Attribute.Description: The number of cases handled by the user.
Attribute.Name: Num_Of_Cases

Attribute.Description: Total weight carried by the user for completion of the task.
Attribute.Name: Total_Weight

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the horizontal distance convered.
Attribute.Name: Horizontal_Distance

Attribute.Description: This column indicates the vertical distance convered.
Attribute.Name: Vertical_Distance

Attribute.Description: The number of pallets handled by the user.
Attribute.Name: Num_Of_Pallets

Attribute.Description: The number of source locations visited by the user.
Attribute.Name: Num_Source_Locations_Visited

Attribute.Description: The number of target locations visited by the user.
Attribute.Name: Num_Target_Locations_Visited

Attribute.Description: The number of source aisles visited by the user.
Attribute.Name: Num_Source_Aisles_Visited

Attribute.Description: The number of target aisles visited by the user.
Attribute.Name: Num_Target_Aisles_Visited

Attribute.Description: The number of source levels visited by the user.
Attribute.Name: Num_Source_Levels_Visited

Attribute.Description: The number of target levels visited by the user.
Attribute.Name: Num_Target_Levels_Visited

Attribute.Description: The number of items handled by the user.
Attribute.Name: Num_Of_Items

Attribute.Description: The minutes credited to the user.
Attribute.Name: Credited_Mins

Attribute.Description: The order number for which the user has done some task.
Attribute.Name: Order_No

Attribute.Description: Thereceipt number for which the user has done some task.
Attribute.Name: Receipt_No

Attribute.Description: The release number for which the user has done some task.
Attribute.Name: Release_No

Attribute.Description: The document type to which the task belongs.
Attribute.Name: Document_Type

Attribute.Description: The prime line number. This is a part of the unique key of the order line.
Attribute.Name: Prime_Line_No

Attribute.Description: The sub line number. This is a part of the unique key of the order line.
Attribute.Name: Sub_Line_No

Attribute.Description: The order header key that is associated with this productivity.
Attribute.Name: Order_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The order line key that is associated with this productivity.
Attribute.Name: Order_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: The order release key that is associated with this productivity.
Attribute.Name: Order_Release_Key

Attribute.Description: The wave number in which a task belongs.
Attribute.Name: Wave_No

Attribute.Description: The shipment number for which the user has done some task.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_No

Attribute.Description: The Container Number for which the user has done some task.
Attribute.Name: Container_No

Attribute.Description: The shipment container key that is associated with this productivity.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Container_Key

Attribute.Description: The shipment key that is associated with this productivity.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Key

Attribute.Description: The batch number.
Attribute.Name: Batch_No

Attribute.Description: The carrier organization code.
Attribute.Name: Scac

Attribute.Description: The load number for which the user has done some task.
Attribute.Name: Load_No

Attribute.Description: The Bill of Lading number.
Attribute.Name: Bol_No

Attribute.Description: The trailer number by which the shipment leaves the node.
Attribute.Name: Trailer_No

Attribute.Description: An attribute used to store manifest number assigned by carrier server.
Attribute.Name: Manifest_No

Attribute.Description: An attribute used to store the classification code of an item.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification_Code

Attribute.Description: The shipment line key that is associated with this productivity.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: The move request key that is associated with this productivity.
Attribute.Name: Move_Request_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier of a move request within the context of a module for a node.
Attribute.Name: Move_Request_No

Attribute.Description: The move request line key that is associated with this productivity.
Attribute.Name: Move_Request_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: The count request key that is associated with this productivity.
Attribute.Name: Count_Request_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier of a count request along with Document type and Node.
Attribute.Name: Count_Request_No

Attribute.Description: A work order within the context of a node and enterprise.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_No

Attribute.Description: The work order key that is associated with this productivity.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Key

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid
